newsitem.title: USA: Dow down more than 50 points.
newsitem.headline: Dow down more than 50 points.

text.p: The Dow Jones industrial average lost more than 50 points in afternoon trading Tuesday as the market was hit by profit-taking for a second day after rocketing to four record high closes last week.
At 3:17 p.m., the Dow was off 50.31 points at 6,040.56, which activated the New York Stock Exchange's limits on program trading.
